title: The Harper Years: Tough Times For Reporters In Canada (RSF - Reporters sans frontières)
text: ( Source : RSF - Reporters sans frontières ) As federal elections will be held in Canada on October 19 , Reporters Without Borders (RSF) reviews the evolution of freedom of the press and information during Prime Minister Stephen Harper 's
